sentences.en: DRC and LVS verification method are introduced which based on Calibre.
sentences.cn: 介绍基于Calibre工具的DRC和LVS验证方法.

sentences.en: He was impressed by the high calibre of applicants for the job.
sentences.cn: 求职人员出色的能力给他留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: His team were of the highest calibre.
His work is of the highest calibre.
I was impressed by the high calibre of the researchers and analysts.
sentences.cn: 研究人员和分析人员的高素质给我留下了深刻印象。

sentences.en: If only we had two right - backs of the same calibre as our left - backs.
sentences.cn: 但愿我们的右路也能有象左路这样两名一样出色的球员.

sentences.en: It became apparent that we could never get the calibre of people we wanted.
sentences.cn: 显然，我们永远无法得到我们想要的那种杰出人才。

sentences.en: It worked out in a thousand little conversations, all of which were of the same calibre.
sentences.cn: 这种气氛可以从无数次谈话中感觉出来.而且每次谈话都是大同小异.

sentences.en: Large calibre, the pumping speed cryopump.
sentences.cn: 大口径 、 大抽速低温泵.

sentences.en: Oxford aims to attract UK and international students of the highest calibre.
sentences.cn: 牛津大学致力于吸引最有才能的本地或国际学生.

sentences.en: The calibre of teaching was very high.
The firm needs more people of your calibre.
sentences.cn: 公司需要多找些有你这种才干的人.

sentences.en: The school attracts a high calibre of student.
sentences.cn: 这所学校吸引高素质的学生。

sentences.en: There is no other player even remotely approaching her calibre.
sentences.cn: 就才干而言，其他选手远远赶不上她。

sentences.en: Two different calibre gun barrels are provided.
sentences.cn: 套件中提供了两种炮管.

sentences.en: Unless you are an escapologist of Mr Cayne's calibre.
sentences.cn: 除非你有Cayne那种逃脱术的本事.

words.tran_cn: [军] 口径；才干；水准（等于calibre）；器量

trans.tran_cn: 口径，能力，水准，枪弹的直径
trans.tran_en: the width of the inside of a gun or tube
